sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3140 ( MEDI_SEQN , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , PSCL_HPYN , VEND_NUMB , VEND_NAME , MEDI_CFCD , CASH_UECT , CASH_UEAM , CTIF_TREA , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #mediSeqn# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #rsnoNumb# , #psclHpyn# , #vendNumb# , #vendName# , #mediCfcd# , #cashUect# , #cashUeam# , #ctifTrea# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO YETA3140 ( MEDI_SEQN , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , PSCL_HPYN , VEND_NUMB , VEND_NAME , MEDI_CFCD , CASH_UECT , CASH_UEAM , CTIF_TREA , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( (SELECT (NVL(MAX(MEDI_SEQN),0) + 1) AS MEDI_SEQN FROM YETA3140 AA WHERE AA.EDAC_RVYY = #edacRvyy# AND AA.SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#) , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #rsnoNumb# , ( DECODE(#psclHpyn#,'1','1',NVL(( SELECT DECODE(BB.PSCL_DDYN,'1','1','2') FROM YETA3220 BB WHERE BB.EDAC_RVYY = #edacRvyy# AND BB.SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd# AND BB.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND BB.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND BB.RSNO_NUMB = #rsnoNumb#),2 )) ) , #vendNumb# , #vendName# , #mediCfcd# , #cashUect# , #cashUeam# , #ctifTrea# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3140 SET MEDI_SEQN=#mediSeqn# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , RSNO_NUMB=#rsnoNumb# , PSCL_HPYN=#psclHpyn# , VEND_NUMB=#vendNumb# , VEND_NAME=#vendName# , MEDI_CFCD=#mediCfcd# , CASH_UECT=#cashUect# , CASH_UEAM=#cashUeam# , CTIF_TREA=#ctifTrea# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE MEDI_SEQN=#mediSeqn# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3140 WHERE MEDI_SEQN=#mediSeqn# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3140 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
RSNO_NUMB=#rsnoNumb#
VEND_NUMB=#vendNumb#
MEDI_CFCD=#mediCfcd#

DELETE FROM YETA3140 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MEDI_SEQN , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , PSCL_HPYN , VEND_NUMB , VEND_NAME , MEDI_CFCD , CASH_UECT , CASH_UEAM , CTIF_TREA , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3140 WHERE MEDI_SEQN=#mediSeqn# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT MEDI_SEQN , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , PSCL_HPYN , VEND_NUMB , VEND_NAME , MEDI_CFCD , CASH_UECT , CASH_UEAM , CTIF_TREA , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3140 WHERE 1=1
MEDI_SEQN = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY MEDI_SEQN DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3140 WHERE 1=1
MEDI_SEQN = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
